thread.title: David (Cork)
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by David (Cork)

author: David (Cork)
title: David (Cork)
text: Easy to find what I wanted on the website, and collect at the shop. Wasn't made clear at checkout, however, that purchasing with PayPal would mean that I could only get a gift voucher when returning the hoodie. If I had used my Mastercard I could have gotten a refund!
